headline: Here's How Much a $1000 Investment in Marriott International Made 10 Years Ago Would Be Worth Today

headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting Marriott International Stock Will Climb or Sink?
summary: While Marriott International has outpaced the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a cautiously optimistic outlook on the stock’s prospects.

headline: Marriott Board Change Raises Questions On Inclusion Oversight And Valuation
summary: Marriott International (NasdaqGS:MAR) announced that board member Debra L. Lee will not stand for re election at the next annual meeting. Lee currently serves as a director and as chair of the Inclusion and Social Impact Committee. The company stated that her decision is not related to any disagreement with Marriott’s policies or practices. For you as an investor, this is a governance update at a global hotel operator that runs and franchises properties under multiple brands. Board level...
